## ConsoleComponent class

Component used for displaying console logs

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ConsoleComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(\_consoleSvc, \_changeDetector)](./common-structured-log.consolecomponent._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ConsoleComponent</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [canCopy](./common-structured-log.consolecomponent.cancopy.md) |  | <code>Clipboard</code> | Indication whether can use copy to clipboard |
|  [currentLogs](./common-structured-log.consolecomponent.currentlogs.md) |  | <code>ConsoleComponentLog[]</code> | Current state of logger |
|  [filterValue](./common-structured-log.consolecomponent.filtervalue.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Current value of filter |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clear()](./common-structured-log.consolecomponent.clear.md) |  | Clears existing logs |
|  [copy()](./common-structured-log.consolecomponent.copy.md) |  | Copies content of whole console log into clipboard |
|  [copyMessage(message)](./common-structured-log.consolecomponent.copymessage.md) |  | Copies message to clipboard |
|  [ngOnDestroy()](./common-structured-log.consolecomponent.ngondestroy.md) |  | Called when component is destroyed |
|  [ngOnInit()](./common-structured-log.consolecomponent.ngoninit.md) |  | Initialize component |
|  [setMessages()](./common-structured-log.consolecomponent.setmessages.md) |  | Sets messages using filter |
